pkgmetadata.longdescription: The **Lino Extensions Library** is a collection of plugins used by many Linoapplications.- This repository is considered an integral part of the Lino framework, which is documented as a whole in the `Lino Book <https://www.lino-framework.org/about/overview.html>`__.- Your feedback is welcome. See https://community.lino-framework.org- API changes to this repository are logged at https://www.lino-framework.org/changes/
